name: Titanium.Media.Item
summary: A representation of a media item returned by openMusicLibrary or queryMusicLibrary.

properties.name: albumArtist
properties.summary: Artist credited for the album containing this item.

properties.name: albumArtistPersistentID
properties.summary: The persistent identifier for an album artist.

properties.name: albumPersistentID
properties.summary: The key for the persistent identifier for an album.

properties.name: albumTitle
properties.summary: Title of the album containing this item.

properties.name: albumTrackCount
properties.summary: Number of tracks for the album containing this item.

properties.name: albumTrackNumber
properties.summary: Track number for this item.

properties.name: artist
properties.summary: Artist credited for this item.

properties.name: artwork
properties.summary: Image for the item's artwork as a Blob object, or null if no artwork is available.

properties.name: assetURL
properties.summary: A URL pointing to the media item.

properties.name: beatsPerMinute
properties.summary: The number of musical beats per minute for the media item, corresponding to the "BPM" field in the Info tab in the "Get Info" dialog in iTunes.

properties.name: bookmarkTime
properties.summary: The user's place in the media item the most recent time it was played.

properties.name: comments
properties.summary: Textual information about the media item, corresponding to the "Comments" field in in the Info tab in the Get Info dialog in iTunes.

properties.name: composer
properties.summary: Composer of this item.

properties.name: dateAdded
properties.summary: Date when the item was added to the music library.

properties.name: discCount
properties.summary: Total number of discs for the album containing this item.

properties.name: discNumber
properties.summary: Disc number for this item in the album.

properties.name: genre
properties.summary: Genre of this item.

properties.name: genrePersistentID
properties.summary: The persistent identifier for a genre.

properties.name: hasProtectedAsset
properties.summary: True if the item represents a protected asset.

properties.name: isCloudItem
properties.summary: True if the media item is an iCloud item.

properties.name: isCompilation
properties.summary: True if this item is part of a compilation album.

properties.name: isExplicit
properties.summary: True if this item is marked as "Explicit".

properties.name: lastPlayedDate
properties.summary: The most recent calendar date on which the user played the media item.

properties.name: lyrics
properties.summary: Lyrics for this item.

properties.name: mediaType
properties.summary: The type of the media.
properties.description: At least in theory, a single item can have more than one media type, in which case the value represents a bitwise-OR of all the applicable media types.

properties.name: persistentID
properties.summary: The key for the persistent identifier for the media item.

properties.name: playbackDuration
properties.summary: Length (in seconds) of this item.

properties.name: playbackStoreID
properties.summary: Used to enqueue store tracks by their ID.

properties.name: playCount
properties.summary: Number of times the item has been played.

properties.name: podcastPersistentID
properties.summary: The persistent identifier for an audio podcast.

properties.name: podcastTitle
properties.summary: Title of a podcast item.
properties.description: Only included if the media type is MUSIC_MEDIA_TYPE_PODCAST.

properties.name: rating
properties.summary: Rating for this item.

properties.name: releaseDate
properties.summary: Date when this this item was released.

properties.name: skipCount
properties.summary: Number of times this item has been skipped.

properties.name: title
properties.summary: Title of this item.

properties.name: userGrouping
properties.summary: Corresponds to the "Grouping" field in the Info tab in the "Get Info" dialog in iTunes.
